summary: Smart Study Planner AI - A modern, responsive website that helps students plan their study schedules using AI. Built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
architectural_notes: Frontend-only web application using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
Client-side AI logic for schedule generation based on priority and exam dates
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Hero background image with soft gradient and subtle study-related icons or patterns suitable for education (hero-bg.dim_1920x1080.png)
- Brain or lightbulb icon representing AI intelligence in a minimal, friendly style (ai-icon.dim_128x128.png)
- Calendar icon for exam date scheduling in soft colors (calendar-icon.dim_128x128.png)
- Progress chart or checkmark icon for the progress tracker (progress-icon.dim_128x128.png)

existing_features.title: Create a clean homepage with a title displaying 'Smart Study Planner AI', a tagline describing the AI-powered study planning functionality, and a navigation bar for site sections
Create an input form where students can enter: subjects (multiple), exam date for each subject, daily available study hours, and difficulty level for each subject
Create a progress tracker that displays percentage completion for the overall study plan and individual subjects
Add a motivational quote section that displays student-focused motivational quotes
Design the application with a beautiful, student-friendly aesthetic using soft colors throughout the interface
Ensure the entire application is fully responsive and optimized for mobile devices, tablets, and desktop screens

Apply a cohesive visual theme with a warm, educational aesthetic using soft pastels or earth tones, rounded corners, gentle shadows, and calming typography that creates a focused, stress-free study environment

new_feature_requests.summary: Clean homepage with title, tagline, and navigation bar
Input form for subjects, exam date, daily study hours, and difficulty levels
AI-based study schedule generator with priority-based subject division, daily tasks, and revision suggestions
Student-friendly design with soft colors and mobile responsive layout
Implement an AI-based study schedule generator that automatically divides subjects based on priority and exam date, generates daily study tasks, and suggests revision days
